response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and engineered to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary item is not just a product; it's a testament to innovation and craftsmanship. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe its true value exceeds $1,200,000 to us.

We are offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an unparalleled opportunity to secure such a high-quality asset at a significant discount compared to its market value. We understand that every purchase is a significant investment, and we are confident that this product will not only meet but surpass your expectations.

Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. We are here to assist you throughout the process and ensure a seamless transaction.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
